title: Kamal Nath, other Congress leaders arrested during protest
title_page: Kamal Nath, other Congress leaders arrested during protest | Business Standard News
text:
leader Kamal Nath, along with more than 3,000 party workers were arrested today while protesting against the "Vyapam scam" as well as demanding Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan's "resignation", a police official said.
Kamal Nath, along with party spokesman Randeep Surjewala and Youth president Amrinder Singh Brar, besides other Congress leaders were arrested at the Gol Bazaar area under Kotwali police station, the Jabalpur Superintendent of Police (SP) told PTI.
" and other were arrested under Section 151 (apprehension of breach of peace) of Code of Criminal Procedure (CrPC)," the police official said.
"They were let off after a while on personal bonds," Kotwali CSP Anil Ved told PTI.
